free_text: Got lost near the river; map could be clearer.
Loved the world atmosphere and sound design.
Combat felt satisfying once I learned the dodge timing.
Quest marker was hard to notice in bright areas.
UI hints helped, but I still missed objectives sometimes.
Enemy damage felt too punishing early on.
Loved the world atmosphere and sound design.
Fast travel is great, but discovering shrines was confusing.
